code:
### 1. 搜索用户
```
GET /api/user/search?keyword={keyword}&page={page}&size={size}
```
**请求参数：**
- keyword: 搜索关键字（用户名、昵称、邮箱）
- page: 页码，默认1
- size: 每页大小，默认20

**响应示例：**
```json
{
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "success",
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "username": "user1",
            "nickname": "用户1",
            "email": "user1@example.com",
            "phone": "13800138000",
            "avatarUrl": "avatar1.jpg",
            "signature": "个性签名",
            "address": "地址"
        }
    ]
}
```
